title: Su-asa
author: Su-asa
content: Am a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.I just registered yesterday so am new here

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMDoes this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.How about you start from this ones  Newbies - Read before posting  Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ The rules are what you can't finish all at once. The most important thing I will advise you to take note of is don't plagiarize, which means you should not copy and paste others content. Just be yourself, and the forum will be a very easy place for you. Just be yourself on the forum and define your purpose on the forum.

comments.author: Good_Doctor
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.I just registered yesterday so am new hereYou're welcome! First of all you should know that you have to be opinionated that in the forum you want to learn and contribute relevantly to post that suites whatever you have understanding about and make sure you go through the rules in the link below it will help you engage correctly.When corrected make sure you take it in good fate so you can grow correctly in your knowledge of Bitcoin as a whole.Once again welcome!Here's the link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0It will guide you on how to operate here.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This is the rules of this forum: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0Merits, activities and new ranks: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2818350.msg28856522#msg28856522Forum ranks/positions/badges (What do those shiny coins under my name mean?): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=178608.msg1861412#msg1861412You are welcome to this forum. Do not spam, do not plagiarize or post low quality contents. Read the rules, read more than you post and learn. Your contribution is highly welcome as well.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.created_time: August 05, 2023, 09:01:56 PMLast edit: August 05, 2023, 09:16:08 PM by rachael9385
comments.body: You are a fresh beginner and you don't need to fill-up your head with my wright up, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0/#post_rulesI think this can help you go a long way on this bitcointalk forum. You are welcomed to the forum mate, on this forum we share ideas with each others, so feel free to ask anything you don't know.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk! I believe you had an idea of what this forum is about before registering an account, we are here to have genuine discussion about bitcoin and matters relating to the bitcoin ecosystem. The links given above will be very helpful and answers at least 80% of the questions you may have as a new member. The rules are detailed and well explained so take your time to read every one of them.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.I just registered yesterday so am new hereHow about starting from learn how to use  Search   very well, it will save you lot of stress and some question you can fine answer to by your self @rachael9385 edit your post, your links appears to be broken.

comments.body: Quote from: Ever-young on August 05, 2023, 09:10:33 PMQuote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? Thanks mate, you did well for correcting me my mistake, now I have edited the link.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help.A warm welcome to you in this Forum. Already Nwada001 and others shared some basic rules which you must know. And they should be maintained by every users in this forum. Breaking any rules of them will cause you ban or being negative trusted. And I don't think they are hard to obey so you just read them before starting forum journey.Another advice is for that you should find out or mark your interests or what you want actually from this forum. If you are interested to discuss then you can read related articles or you can make a topic or ask a question. Another reason to join in this forum is to earn passive income and you will get active bounties to join. Or you may have interests in growing your Rank then you have to continuously contribute in this forum and have to make useful posts. So here you will get lot of opportunities to learn as well as earn. So first mark your interests and grow yourself perfectly.

comments.author: Russlenat
comments.body: Welcome onboard mate. Just enjoy your stay here while you are also exploring the forum and at the same time, gaining knowledge and experiences from other members because that will serve as a mirror so you won’t be creating the same mistakes done by them. And as piece of advice, never take this forum too serious because that will be unhealthy for you in the long run. Just be yourself, listen to others ideas and perspectives, because one day you’ll also share your significant learnings in the forum. Just trust the process, and most especially, never rush to make profits, that can wait when you have gained sufficient knowledge and skills so you’ll be capable whatever crypto endeavor you plan to enter.

comments.author: nurilham
comments.body: Welcome @Su-asaIf you are a beginner, you need to read the pinned threads in each board. Especially the pinned threads in Meta, Beginners & Help, and your local board. There are basic information that we can get on those pinned threads. Anyway, where do you come from, dude? Have you taken a look at your local board? I suggest you to go there first because the information on your local board should be easier to understand.My other suggestions:- Be more active to involve in any discussion, especially in your local board- Be serious to learn, specifically basic things- Don't feel afraid to ask if you don't understand- Avoid plagiarism if you want to survive a long time

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: This shows you don't read because at this section of the board you would see all the instructions that says " you need to read before posting" why don't you read there before asking questions. It takes nothing to read and get the information required. Usually it's very hard for newbies to devote time to read and understand how things functions except they are being told or directly shares link with them before they could understand few things and even as that they always want everything to be possible and cheaper as they want without knowing it all takes time to get whatever they want over here. There is no need of sharing link as I believe few poster already shared link with you.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.I just registered yesterday so am new hereYou're welcome to the community with lots of potential people who are experience in every angle of crypto you can think of as well as other aspects. Of course, one will definitely start from somewhere and you've already kick start your own journey. I will remind you just like the previous comments here already did, in every setting there's must be rules and regulations guiding it else it will turn to be a dangerous zone for the weaks. In that regard, Bitcointalk Forum has some rules guiding it and it daily users.Take your time to look here welcome message. That's a welcome message for you as a new member and some piece of advice for better experience in the forum. To be successful here, you must not be lazy to read because readers are the learners. Give Forum your time and Forum will reward you in return in one or the other.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Welcome to bitcointalk where you have the opportunity to learn, grow, earn,and invest. Just as the name implies, bitcointalk is a community where different people meet to share different kinds of useful informations that are educative and beneficial to her members, lot's of knowledges are gotten here as a result of the members who make out time to make researches that will provide lasting solution to the problem of some members here, so many investment strategies are shared here freely but members are advised to verify before they invest and so on.You can begin your journey by reading the rules from the links that has been provided for you but don't forget to give attention to learn and don't be in a hurry to grow.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.I just registered yesterday so am new hereAs a fresher you are I think that you have long ways to follow and the first you should is to try to be acclimatised with the formate of the forum by learning the procedures of bitcointalk because if you don't understand the procedures of bitcoin what will happen is you will be misguided. Many people have come here but they couldn't make it due to they did not follow the protocol of forum

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: It's not hard to start here in the forum. All you have to do is to learn through reading and research either a thread in Bitcointalk forum or in other crypto website. You should also familiarize how this forum works and read the forum rules to avoid getting banned. Most forum users who got banned is because they plagiarized a content that isn't theirs but use it as their own. That's the rule that most forum members doesn't like or frowned upon doing so.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.I just registered yesterday so am new hereEvery organization or community have its own rules and regulation and the same thing goes with Bitcoin activities there are certain rules you have to follow in other to keep your investment safe so you won't be the next victim of online theft or crypto scammer.For startup knowledge about Bitcoin and this forum, I will advise you to read the 5 resources to teach the average Joe about Bitcoin created by legendary user Fillippone.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Your help comes from your seriousness. Here nobody will spoon feed you because you already found your way here either on your own or through someone but you don't need to depend on anyone to grow. Read the rules and I think you should stay more on this board for sometime and read about what response users are dropping on other threads here.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: The rules have been linked already, so I’m just going to summarize it — don’t do something stupid.Also, prioritize learning about Bitcoin than learning about Bitcointalk.* If you like reading articles: https://coindesk.com/learn* If you like reading books: https://theinternetofmoney.info/* If you like watching videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPQwGV1aLnTuN6kdNWlElfr2tzigB9NnjSecurity related:* https://chainsec.io* https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information/security.htmlIf you want to get more technical* https://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbook#chapters

comments.body: Quote from: Ever-young on August 05, 2023, 09:10:33 PMQuote from: Su-asa on August 05, 2023, 08:43:13 PMAm a fresh beginner and I don't know were to start from, please I need help. Does this place have any rules that I need to know about? If their is any rules please someone should share with me.I just registered yesterday so am new hereHow about starting from learn how to use  Search   very well, it will save you lot of stress and some question you can fine answer to by your self @rachael9385 edit your post, your links appears to be broken. Sorry, sir. I am not sure whether I am the only one who has trouble using the forum search, but it is not functioning as it should. Perhaps there is a guide on how to use the forum search.
